dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, we've been hearing a lot about, uh, the situation in the Middle East, and it looks like Kazakhstan's Ministry of Foreign Affairs has given us some updates regarding their citizens there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, we've been hearing a lot about, uh, the situation in the Middle East, and it looks like Kazakhstan's Ministry of Foreign Affairs has given us some updates regarding their citizens there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's right. They've actually confirmed the numbers. So, currently, we have 132 Kazakh nationals in Iran and, uh, 219 in Israel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's right. They've actually confirmed the numbers. So, currently, we have one hundred thirty two Kazakh nationals in Iran and, uh, two hundred nineteen in Israel.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At present, 132 Kazakh citizens are in Iran and 219 in Israel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, those are, like, pretty specific numbers. And the big question, of course, is about their safety, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, those are, like, pretty specific numbers. And the big question, of course, is about their safety, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the good news there, according to ministry spokesperson Aibek Smadiyarov, is that there have been no casualties or injuries among Kazakhstani citizens. Which is, you know, a huge relief.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the good news there, according to ministry spokesperson Aibek Smadiyarov, is that there have been no casualties or injuries among Kazakhstani citizens. Which is, you know, a huge relief.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry confirmed that there have been no casualties or injuries among Kazakhstani citizens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That is, that's really positive to hear. But I also understand that, um, some people are having trouble getting home?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is, that's really positive to hear. But I also understand that, um, some people are having trouble getting home?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, unfortunately. They've got, like, around 300 citizens—mostly tourists, actually—who are finding it difficult to leave because of all these flight cancellations by various airlines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, unfortunately. They've got, like, around three hundred citizens-mostly tourists, actually-who are finding it difficult to leave because of all these flight cancellations by various airlines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Smadiyarov, approximately 300 Kazakh citizens—mostly tourists—are experiencing difficulties departing due to canceled flights by several airlines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow. So, what's, what's the ministry doing about that? Are their diplomats, you know, on the ground trying to help?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow. So, what's, what's the ministry doing about that? Are their diplomats, you know, on the ground trying to help?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Smadiyarov said their diplomats *are* working on the ground. And they're actually hoping more than half of those folks will be able to return home soon, thanks to some agreements they've reached with the airlines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Smadiyarov said their diplomats are working on the ground. And they're actually hoping more than half of those folks will be able to return home soon, thanks to some agreements they've reached with the airlines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our diplomats are working on the ground. We expect that more than half of these citizens will be able to return home soon thanks to agreements reached with airlines, he emphasized.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so there's, like, a plan in place. What about the ones who are still there? What's the advice for them?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so there's, like, a plan in place. What about the ones who are still there? What's the advice for them?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The main thing is increased caution. They're telling citizens in both Iran and Israel not to leave their homes unless it's absolutely necessary. Just, uh, stay vigilant, follow local news, and stick to what the authorities are saying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The main thing is increased caution. They're telling citizens in both Iran and Israel not to leave their homes unless it's absolutely necessary. Just, uh, stay vigilant, follow local news, and stick to what the authorities are saying.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We ask our citizens in Iran and Israel not to leave their places of residence unless absolutely necessary, to remain vigilant and cautious, follow the news, and adhere to the recommendations of local authorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And to, like, stay in touch with the embassies, I assume?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And to, like, stay in touch with the embassies, I assume?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. And, uh, they've actually already provided assistance to quite a few. Like, on June 14th, six Kazakhs on official business got home via Azerbaijan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. And, uh, they've actually already provided assistance to quite a few. Like, on June fourteenth, six Kazakhs on official business got home via Azerbaijan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 14, six Kazakhstani nationals on official business in Iran were helped to return home via Azerbaijan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow, so they're actively helping. [interrupts] And then more recently?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow, so they're actively helping. And then more recently?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, just the next day, June 15th, they organized the departure of 68 citizens from Iran to Turkmenistan. That group included diplomat families, some OECD staff, you know, people on official assignments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, just the next day, June fifteenth, they organized the departure of sixty eight citizens from Iran to Turkmenistan. That group included diplomat families, some O E C D staff, you know, people on official assignments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 15, the departure of 68 Kazakhstani citizens from Iran to Turkmenistan was organized. This group included family members of diplomats, staff of the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development, seconded from Kazakhstan, and other citizens on official assignments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So it sounds like a lot of coordinated effort, which is good. Um, what's the overall sentiment from the ministry?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it sounds like a lot of coordinated effort, which is good. Um, what's the overall sentiment from the ministry?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're hoping all of their compatriots will be able to return home in the coming days. The diplomatic missions in Iran are still operating as normal, which is, uh, important.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're hoping all of their compatriots will be able to return home in the coming days. The diplomatic missions in Iran are still operating as normal, which is, uh, important.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We hope that all of our compatriots will be able to return home in the coming days, he added. Kazakh diplomatic missions in Iran continue to operate as normal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's a relief to hear. And, you know, it's interesting because we had that previous report about Kazakhstani planes flying to the Middle East despite warnings, so it's good to see they're now actively assisting people to get out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a relief to hear. And, you know, it's interesting because we had that previous report about Kazakhstani planes flying to the Middle East despite warnings, so it's good to see they're now actively assisting people to get out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Read also: Kazakhstani planes flew to Middle East despite warnings ' Foreign Ministry
